contact_department: Division of Rheumatology, Immunology and Allergy
data_processing: The data were analyzed with Microarray Suite version 5.0 (MAS 5.0) using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as normalization method. The trimmed mean target intensity of each array was arbitrarily set to 500.
description: gene expression data in osteoclast cultures
extract_protocol_ch1: RNAeasy extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
growth_protocol_ch1: Osteoclast precursors were purified from whole bone marrow of n=3 mice (replicate 1) or n=4 mice (replicate 2) by flow cytometric sorting for CD11b- CD3e- B220- ckit+cfms+ cell s and plated at 20,000/24well plate in alpha-meM with mCSF and RANKL.
hyb_protocol: Following fragmentation, 10 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on GeneChip Drosophila Genome Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
label_protocol_ch1: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).
scan_protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
title: wild-type osteoclasts rep1
treatment_protocol_ch1: Osteoclat precursor cultures were cultured in the presence of MCSF and RANKL for 3 days to generate early osteoclasts.
